name: Dandelion's Journey
description:
Guide the dandelion to the ground safely for it to grow.

If the game won't start, try clicking on the game window. The game stops when you click outside the window.

Goal

The dandelion must reach the ground to keep the score. 
Press start when the blow strength slider is on lowest value to start on lowest height
and on the highest value to start on highest height.

AVOID: Leaves, Insects, Branches, and Birds
COLLECT: Dandelion Puffs

Controls

Tap or Click to Change Direction
Tip: Quickly tap to slow your fall.

Credits:

Programming, Arts, and Game Design - me
SFX - are taken from zapsplat.com
BGM - taken from dl-sounds.com
